statements: SELECT * FROM claims_resolution;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, adjuster_name FROM claims_resolution;
SELECT adjuster_name, policy_number, documentation FROM claims_resolution;
SELECT * FROM claims_resolution WHERE claim_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM claims_resolution ORDER BY policy_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_resolution WHERE adjuster_name = 'John Doe' AND policy_number LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT claim_id, adjuster_name FROM claims_resolution WHERE documentation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY adjuster_name DESC;
SELECT policy_number, documentation FROM claims_resolution WHERE claim_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM claims_resolution WHERE communication_logs LIKE '%urgent%' AND adjuster_name != 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY claim_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT adjuster_name FROM claims_resolution WHERE policy_number = 'XYZ123' OR documentation LIKE '%pending%';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, status FROM Claims WHERE loss_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, adjuster_id, status FROM Claims WHERE adjuster_id = 12345 ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT doc_id, claim_id, document_type FROM Documentation WHERE document_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, document_type, document_text FROM Documentation WHERE document_type LIKE '%report%' ORDER BY document_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Documentation WHERE document_type = 'invoice' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, COUNT(claim_id) FROM Claims GROUP BY policy_number HAVING COUNT(claim_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Claims c INNER JOIN Documentation d ON c.claim_id = d.claim_id WHERE c.status = 'approved' AND d.document_type = 'report';
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, loss_date FROM Claims ORDER BY loss_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM adjusters;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email FROM adjusters WHERE adjuster_id = 1;
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder_name FROM policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT adjuster_name, log_time, log_message FROM adjusters JOIN communication_logs ON adjusters.adjuster_id = communication_logs.adjuster_id;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Home Insurance';
SELECT * FROM adjusters WHERE adjuster_id = 1;
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder_name FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT adjuster_name AS 'Adjuster Name', adjuster_email AS 'Email' FROM adjusters WHERE adjuster_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM communication_logs WHERE adjuster_id = 1 ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder_name, policy_type FROM policies WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM policy_information;
SELECT policy_id, insured_name FROM policy_information WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM policy_information ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email FROM adjusters WHERE adjuster_id < 5;
SELECT log_date, log_content FROM communication_logs WHERE policy_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM policy_information;
SELECT insured_name, policy_type FROM policy_information WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM documentation ORDER BY document_type DESC;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM communication_logs GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 5;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email FROM adjusters WHERE adjuster_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM policy_information;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount, effective_date FROM policy_information WHERE policy_type = 'Car';
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM documentation ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email, adjuster_phone FROM adjusters WHERE adjuster_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT policy_id, log_type, log_description, log_date FROM communication_logs WHERE log_type = 'Error' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_information ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM policy_information WHERE policy_type = 'Home' AND premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.log_type, c.log_description, p.policy_holder_name FROM communication_logs c JOIN policy_information p ON c.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE c.log_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT d.document_name, d.upload_date, p.policy_holder_name FROM documentation d JOIN policy_information p ON d.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE d.document_type = 'Claim' ORDER BY d.upload_date DESC;

SELECT p.policy_holder_name, a.adjuster_name, c.claim_status FROM policy_information p JOIN adjusters a ON p.policy_id = a.adjuster_id JOIN claims c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.claim_status = 'Approved';
